home.title: Home
home.slogan: Where Experiences Come Alive, and Journeys Begin!
home.tab4: A platform built for curious people who want to discover, book, and enjoy meaningful experiences one unforgettable moment at a time.
home.howToUseDescription: A platform to explore and book unique experiences hosted by locals across Saudi Arabia
home.platformDescription: Zuroona is a platform developed and run by ambitious Saudi youth, dedicated to supporting the Kingdom's Vision 2030 for the tourism sector and beyond. We focus on creating authentic experiences that connect guests with hosts, offering more than just commercial tourism, providing a true and personal way to explore Saudi culture.
home.noEvents: No events available at the moment

signup.tab31: Where will your group be located?

signup.tab40: Choose a name that will give people a clear idea of what the group is about. You can edit this later if you change your mind.

footer.tab2: Zuroona is a platform developed and run by ambitious Saudi youth, dedicated to supporting the Kingdom's Vision 2030 for the tourism sector and beyond. We focus on creating authentic experiences that connect guests with hosts, offering more than just commercial tourism, providing a true and personal way to explore Saudi culture
footer.tab12: Zuroona is a platform developed and run by ambitious Saudi youth, dedicated to supporting the Kingdom's Vision 2030 for the tourism sector and beyond.

about.heading: About Zuroona
about.content: Zuroona connects people through authentic Saudi experiences. We support Vision 2030 by creating meaningful cultural connections between hosts and guests.

interview.tab2: Please answer the following questions to help us understand your experience and expertise.
interview.tab13: Your answers have been submitted successfully.
interview.tab16: Please answer the following questions to help us understand your experience and expertise.
interview.tab27: Your answers have been submitted successfully.
interview.1: Why do you want to become a host on Zuroona, and what unique cultural experiences can you offer to your guests?
interview.1placeholder: Share your motivation and the unique experiences you can offer...
interview.2: How do you ensure that guests feel welcome and comfortable during their visit?
interview.2placeholder: Describe your approach to making guests feel welcome...
interview.3: Can you describe an authentic Saudi experience or experience you would offer to guests that reflects the local culture?
interview.3placeholder: Describe an authentic cultural experience you would offer...
interview.4: Do you have any previous work experience related to hospitality or event hosting, such as a freelance work document from the Ministry of Human Resources, a professional permit from the Ministry of Tourism, or any other relevant experience? If yes, please be prepared to provide documentation later.
interview.4placeholder: Share any relevant experience or certifications...
interview.minLength: Answer must be at least 10 characters

terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully
terms.intro: This document outlines the terms and conditions governing your use of Zuroona platform and services.
terms.contactUs: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us
privacy.intro: Learn how Zuroona collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy.dataProtectionDesc: Your data is encrypted and secure
privacy.contactUs: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us:

termsRules.title: Important Rules & Guidelines
termsRules.noUnauthorizedContent: Do not use any Content without the owner's permission or unless authorized by these Terms or another agreement.
termsRules.followHealthGuidelines: Follow the guidelines from the Saudi Ministry of Health to ensure your and others' safety during the experience, particularly in relation to COVID-19.
termsRules.complyWithLaws: Comply with all applicable legal obligations.
termsRules.understandPrivacyLaws: Ensure you understand and comply with the relevant laws, including those related to privacy, data protection, and export regulations.
termsRules.personalInfoTitle: If you provide personal information of others to us, you must:
termsRules.personalInfo1: Do so in accordance with applicable laws,
termsRules.personalInfo2: Be authorized to provide that information, and
termsRules.personalInfo3: Permit us to process the information as per our Privacy Policy.
termsRules.reviewTerms: Make sure to review and adhere to our Terms, Policies, and guidelines.
